EPOCHS: late-night contemporary city, cyber-noir undertone, post-rain streets
near-future megacity outskirts, quiet urban decay with luxury details
modern nightlife district, neon signage and wet asphalt reflections
post-industrial inner city afterhours, gritty realism, editorial mood
OUTFITS: black bomber jacket over fitted top, minimalist street couture
cropped hoodie with subtle harness straps, tactical-chic silhouette
structured black mini dress with discreet leather paneling
oversized jacket with leather accents, high-waist skirt or shorts
monochrome streetwear layers with metal hardware, zippers, buckles
sleek bodycon outfit under a heavy coat, urban executive-night vibe
LIGHTING: magenta neon rim light with cyan fill bounce from wet pavement
high-contrast signage lighting, sculpted shadows on cheekbones and jaw
hard side light from a flickering neon sign, controlled back rim separation
low-key cinematic lighting with neon reflections in puddles
chiaroscuro street lighting, highlights on leather, nylon, and metal
BACKGROUNDS: tight alley canyon between tall buildings, stacked neon signs and grime
abandoned service corridor with peeling walls, exposed conduits and cables
ruined courtyard shaft opening to the sky, towering concrete frames
wet backstreet with cracked asphalt, puddles, and signage reflections
dense urban trench with vertical signage, broken panels, and hanging wires
OBJECTS: vertical neon signage with partial letters and flicker
tangled overhead power lines and junction boxes
puddles reflecting magenta and cyan, ripples from light rain
distressed posters and graffiti tags on cracked concrete
metal pipes, railings, and cable bundles used as leading lines
POSES: dominant low crouch with one knee raised, hand reaching toward the lens
one-foot-forward power pose with the sneaker pushed into extreme foreground
half-squat on pavement, elbow resting on knee, relaxed but assertive hand
leaning back against a wall, chin slightly lifted, controlled stillness
slow step mid-motion, coat trailing, gaze angled downward at camera
seated/crouched pose framed by architecture, legs forming strong diagonals
EXPRESSIONS: cold detached gaze with restrained menace
neutral editorial expression, lips slightly parted, unbothered confidence
piercing stare, calm dominance, minimal emotion
subtle smirk of control, eyes locked on the lens
distant eyes, quiet authority, no overt softness
CAMERA_ANGLES: extreme worm’s-eye view from ground level, camera almost touching pavement
ultra low-angle wide lens 18–24mm, exaggerated foreground sneaker scale
ground-level close-up on shoe in foreground, subject towering in midground
low-angle dutch tilt with strong verticals from buildings and signage
street-level three-quarter view with leading lines of cables and neon
low-angle fashion editorial framing, shallow depth of field, cinematic bokeh
ATMOSPHERES: light rain haze with neon diffusion and wet concrete sheen
noir smog with faint fog drifting through the alley
humid night air with subtle steam from vents, distant city hum
soft neon bloom with fine film grain and muted contrast roll-off
after-rain stillness, flickering signs, quiet tension in empty streets
ACCESSORIES: chunky sneakers with visible stitching and worn rubber texture
tattoos on thigh or calf, crisp ink lines under neon light
thin choker or collar strap, understated fetish hint
silver rings and small hoop earrings catching rim light
tactical belt strap details with metal buckles and zippers
glossy nails or fingerless gloves, hand placed close to lens

SENSUALITY_LEVEL.0: suggestive but restrained, professional editorial distance, no explicit focus on body
SENSUALITY_LEVEL.1: controlled sensual presence through pose, fabric tension, and confident gaze, tasteful street couture
SENSUALITY_LEVEL.2: strong erotic charge expressed via dominance, proximity to lens, and deliberate concealment, still non-explicit and fashion-forward

HORROR_INTENSITY.0: pure fashion noir, clean realism, no threat
HORROR_INTENSITY.1: subtle menace in shadows and environment, uneasy quiet streets
HORROR_INTENSITY.2: heavier tension, harsher shadows, decay emphasized, still grounded and non-fantasy
